full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL MGON DON LNGA LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (ZHES DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I @004A *, ,GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA  'DI NI RTZOD PA'I DUS KYIS THA MA'I RANG CAG SEMS CAN RNAMS LA MI DANG MI MIN GYI GNOD PA CHAR LDAR 'BAB PA'I DUS 'DI LA RANG GZHAN KUN LA PHAN DANG, KHYAD PAR RIGS DANG DUS SHIN TU MTHO ZHING DU MTHO ZHING PHUN GSUM TSOGS PA DANG RANG PA DANG DAM TSIG GTZANG MA RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA THU SHI YE GUNG KHUN DE LING DUR GI CHI RIN CHEN RDO RJE'I DON DU, ,SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DZNY'A NA MING CAN GYIS BRIS SO, ,BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN 'DOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,) SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS PAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,)
